member.name: T:DOWILL.Web.AccessProviders.AccessPersonalizationProvider
member.devdoc: The provider used to access the personalization store for WebPart pages from an DOWILL.Web.AccessProvider database.

member.name: T:DOWILL.Web.VersatilePage
member.summary: This page can store viewstate info in session cache on server side. For using ViewState server side cache, you may add such setting in "web.config" : <add key="ViewStateCacheSize" value="15" /> to enable it.

member.name: M:DOWILL.Web.VersatilePage.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium(System.Object)
member.summary: Save ViewState info to server cache or on client page (Depend on cache size setting - 0 : store on client, larger than 0 : store on server side)

member.name: M:DOWILL.Web.VersatilePage.LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium
member.summary: Load ViewState info from server cache or from client page (Depend on cache size setting - 0 : from client, larger than 0 : from server side)

member.name: P:DOWILL.Web.VersatilePage.ViewStateCacheSize
member.summary: Indicate how large cache size is for viewstate in session. 0 means no cache, use client ViewState only.
